title: Analyze codebase structure
description: Explore the internal/tickboard directory structure. List all .ts files, count lines of code in each, and write a summary to /tmp/codebase-analysis.md describing the component hierarchy. This requires multiple file reads and analysis.
closed_reason: Analyzed internal/tickboard directory: found 39 .ts files totaling 13,837 lines. Created /tmp/codebase-analysis.md with full line counts, component hierarchy (tick-board -> tick-column -> tick-card, ticks-app for dashboard), categorized components into board (tick-*), base (ticks-*), and run (run-*) groups, documented state management (Nanostores) and data flow.
